update goods
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
